thread.title: Rockfall mitigation closes Colorado 8 between E-470, Morrison
thread.title_full: Rockfall mitigation closes Colorado 8 between E-470, Morrison - The Denver Post

author: Elizabeth Hernandez
title: Rockfall mitigation closes Colorado 8 between E-470, Morrison
text:
A stretch of highway between C-470 and Morrison will be closed for about an hour Friday for emergency rockfall mitigation, officials said.
The situation requires closing Colorado Highway 8 west of C-470 to Market Street in Morrison starting at 5 p.m. Friday, according to a CDOT news release.
The rock hazard is the size of a small vehicle, the release said, and is likely caused by wet weather and fluctuation temperatures.
Elizabeth Hernandez: 303-954-1223, ehernandez@denverpost.com or twitter.com/ehernandez
